thread.section_title: The New Yorker A Wyndham Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: First class
thread.title_full: First class - Review of The New Yorker A Wyndham Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Fergal M
title: First class
text: My wife and I were here for three days and will definitely be back next time we are in new York. We flew over from Ireland for st. Patrick's day. Got an upgraded room because it was our honey moon to a fantastic room with an excellent view. Hotel staff were so friendly and helpful especially John who worked at the guest relations desk one of the nicest men I have ever met. He sorted us out with all we needed even got us a taxi when we were leaving and personally carried our bags out for us. Would Definitely recommend this hotel for a visit.
